attributes.action: protest about the arrest of Damian Green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As law abiding, hard working, tax paying, British citizens, we wish to register the strongest possible protest at the arrest of Damian Green.  The constitutional job of Her Majesty's Opposition is to hold the government to account.   This function cannot be carried out if MPs have to consider the likelihood of being arrested in a dawn raid, before they disclose information which is in the public interest but which the Government prefers to keep private.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
